name: Alive » Playable MV
description:
No matter what life throws at me, as long as I am still alive, I can smile and live another day.

A free standalone point-and-click rhythm game of Alive by Moon Jelly & kaguraa. Download below.

CONTROLS Input Aim & Launch Point and click Mute song M Lower volume ,  or scroll wheel Increase volume . or scroll wheel
CLICK WHEN CIRCLE CLOSES IN SUPPORT THE CREATORS

Instrument/mixing: kaguraa

Vocal/Lyric: Moon Jelly
